name: Chicken Biryani
description: Traditional Karachi-style biryani made with basmati rice, chicken, and rich Pakistani spices.

name: Beef Pulao
description: Aromatic beef yakhni pulao with whole spices, caramelized onions, and fragrant rice.

name: Sindhi Biryani
description: Spicy and tangy biryani from Sindh made with potatoes, chicken, and dried plums.

name: Chicken Malai Boti
description: Creamy marinated chicken chunks grilled to perfection on skewers.

name: Beef Seekh Kebab
description: Minced beef mixed with spices, skewered and grilled over charcoal.

name: Chicken Wings (Spicy Lahori)
description: Crispy Lahori-style chicken wings tossed in homemade masala sauce.

name: Chicken Tikka Pizza
description: A fusion of Italian pizza and Pakistani flavors with spicy chicken tikka topping.

name: Behari Kebab Pizza
description: Loaded with spicy Behari-style beef kebab, onions, and mozzarella cheese.

name: Vegetable Supreme Pizza
description: Topped with mushrooms, olives, capsicum, tomatoes, and onions on a cheesy base.
